title: ChestCommands菜单怎么用命令打不开了
author: 嘿嘿159
txt_content:
ChestCommands菜单怎么用命令打不开了




XR%1L5W6IJJR`Q2HWK6P2[U.png (31.91 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2017-8-2 16:10 上传

replies.author: aizhi_D
replies.txt_content: 给予玩家chestcommands.item.菜单名字.yml，更细化的权限就在mcbbs里面找找吧

replies.author: Lizier
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp 玩家组名 chestcommands.item.菜单名字.yml
/mangaddp 玩家组名 chestcommands.open.菜单名字.yml

/mangaddp builder chestcommands.open.菜单名字.yml
/mangaddp default chestcommands.open.菜单名字.yml
